data.ProductDescription: Looking for an account you can personalise? This gives you the flexibility to do so.
data.CardNotes: You can choose a cash card or a contactless debit card.

FeatureDetails.FeatureDescription: Personalise your debit card with your favourite photo or choose one from our gallery.

Eligibility.Description: Eligibility for this account depends on you meeting our credit criteria, including checks we may carry out with credit and fraud prevention agencies.

OverdraftTierBand.Notes: NOTE - Barclays overdrafts are charged daily fees (not interest rates) to make the cost of an overdraft easy to  understand. If you're facing a number of different charges on your overdraft or Unpaid fee in any one day, we’ll only charge you a single fee – whichever is the highest.

NOTE - Barclays overdrafts are charged daily fees (not interest rates) to make the cost of an overdraft easy to  understand. If you're facing a number of different charges on your overdraft or Unpaid fee in any one day, we’ll only charge you a single fee – whichever is the highest.

NOTE - Barclays overdrafts are charged daily fees (not interest rates) to make the cost of an overdraft easy to  understand. If you're facing a number of different charges on your overdraft or Unpaid fee in any one day, we’ll only charge you a single fee – whichever is the highest.

OverdraftTierBandSet.Notes: NOTE - Barclays overdrafts are charged daily fees (not interest rates) to make the cost of an overdraft easy to  understand. Emergency Borrowing lets you borrow an extra, pre-arranged amount if you need to go over your overdraft limit once in a while. It costs £5 a day, and you only pay if you use it. The £5 fee is capped at 7 days each monthly charging period, so it’ll never cost you more than £35 a month. If you've reached the 7-day cap and you have an overdraft, you'll then be charged the appropriate daily overdraft fee for the rest of that monthly charging period while you are in it. If you're facing a number of different charges on your overdraft or Unpaid fee in any one day, we’ll only charge you a single fee – whichever is the highest.

OverdraftTierBand.Notes: NOTE - Barclays overdrafts are charged daily fees (not interest rates) to make the cost of an overdraft easy to  understand. If you're facing a number of different charges on your overdraft or Unpaid fee in any one day, we’ll only charge you a single fee – whichever is the highest.

FeeSubDetails.FeesAndChargesNotes: £5 via online banking, £15 via branch or telephone banking

You will not be charged more than one Unpaid transaction fee in any one working day. If you're facing a number of different charges on your overdraft or Unpaid fee in any one day, we’ll only charge you a single fee – whichever is the highest.
£15 via online banking
£15 via online banking

BenefitDetail.BenefitDescription: With Blue Rewards, you’ll get rewards each month, plus cashback from over 200 retailers when you shop – all for just £3 per month. Conditions apply.

From your mobile phone and laptop, to your tablet and camera – protect what's important to you with our Tech Pack. When adding your first pack no daily fees are charged on arranged overdrafts up to £200. When you go over your £200 limit, daily fees are charged on the whole balance of your arranged overdraft. (Subject to status)

Get worldwide family travel insurance and comprehensive UK & European RAC breakdown cover When adding your first pack no daily fees are charged on arranged overdrafts up to £200. When you go over your £200 limit, daily fees are charged on the whole balance of your arranged overdraft. (Subject to status)

Get airport lounge access, airport parking and hotels discounts, worldwide family travel insurance and comprehensive UK & European RAC breakdown cover When adding your first pack no daily fees are charged on arranged overdrafts up to £200. When you go over your £200 limit, daily fees are charged on the whole balance of your arranged overdraft. (Subject to status)

Our Home Pack covers your satellite & TV equipment and home appliances, as well as giving you access to phone-based support for your home computer, a legal and tax helpline, and a lifestyle concierge service.When adding your first pack no daily fees are charged on arranged overdrafts up to £200. When you go over your £200 limit, daily fees are charged on the whole balance of your arranged overdraft. (Subject to status)

Our Home Protection Pack features gas boiler and central heating cover, and extended warranty on household appliances and home entertainment devices.When adding your first pack no daily fees are charged on arranged overdrafts up to £200. When you go over your £200 limit, daily fees are charged on the whole balance of your arranged overdraft. (Subject to status)

Take control of your money and put an end to Unpaid Transaction Fees, for a small monthly fee that could save you money. If you regularly have transactions returned because of a lack of funds, and as a result incur charges, Control Feature could be for you.

Credit Manager is a non-insurance service designed to give customers access to their market credit profile information, and support to responsibly manage and help to protect their profile from damage caused by identity fraud.

data.ProductDescription: If you pay an annual gross income of £75,000+ into one of our current accounts, or save or invest £100,000+ with us, this account gives you an exclusive service.
data.CardNotes: You can choose a cash card or a contactless debit card.

FeatureDetails.FeatureDescription: Personalise your debit card with your favourite photo or choose one from our gallery.

FeatureDetails.FeatureName: Enjoy exclusive Premier Rewards and benefits
Bespoke Individual Review with our Premier Relationship Team

Eligibility.Description: An annual gross income paid into a Barclays current account of £75,000 or more or £100,000 or more saved or invested with us.

data.ProductDescription: If you're interested in an account offering no-frills banking and you're not able to open a regular one, Barclays Basic Current Account could be right for you.
data.CardNotes: You can choose a cash card or a contactless debit card.
data.CreditScoringPartOfAccountOpeningText: EU residents will not be credit scored when opening the account.
CreditScoringPartOfAccountOpeningIDVerif: EU residents will not be credit scored when opening the account.

FeatureDetails.FeatureDescription: Personalise your debit card with your favourite photo or choose one from our gallery.

Eligibility.Description: Barclays Basic Current Account is a basic account that offers free, no-frills banking for customers who may not be able to open a regular current account. You can qualify for this account if you don't qualify for one of our other accounts and/or you have no existing bank current account in the UK.

data.ProductDescription: An account for students studying full time in the UK.
data.CardNotes: You can choose a cash card or a contactless debit card.

FeatureDetails.FeatureDescription: Personalise your debit card with your favourite photo or choose one from our gallery.

Eligibility.Description: An account for students studying full time in the UK.

OverdraftTierBand.Notes: NOTE - Barclays overdrafts are charged daily fees (not interest rates) to make the cost of an overdraft easy to  understand. You can apply for an initial £500 fee-free overdraft when you open your account and up to £3,000 fee-free while you’re studying (all overdrafts including fee-free amounts are subject to application, status and lending criteria). The maximum overdraft limits are: Account opening: up to £500,Term 1: up to £500, Term 2: up to £1,000, Term 3: up to £1,500, Term 4: up to £2,000, Term 5: up to £2,500, Term 6 and beyond: up to £3,000. If you're facing a number of different charges on your overdraft or Unpaid fee in any one day, we’ll only charge you a single fee – whichever is the highest.

NOTE - Barclays overdrafts are charged daily fees (not interest rates) to make the cost of an overdraft easy to  understand. data.ProductDescription: Bridge the gap between your studies and your new life with this straightforward graduate account.
data.CardNotes: You can choose a cash card or a contactless debit card.

FeatureDetails.FeatureDescription: Personalise your debit card with your favourite photo or choose one from our gallery.

Eligibility.Description: Bridge the gap between your studies and your new life with this straightforward graduate account.

OverdraftTierBand.Notes: NOTE - Barclays overdrafts are charged daily fees (not interest rates) to make the cost of an overdraft easy to  understand. If you’ve graduated within the last 3 years, you can apply for an overdraft of up to £3,000 (subject to status). This is a breakdown of the fee-free amounts available based on how long ago you graduated. The maximum overdraft you can apply for with this account is £3,000.1st year after graduation: Up to £3,000, 2nd year after graduation: Up to £2,000, 3rd year after graduation: Up to £1,000, Overdrafts (including fee free amounts) are subject to status and application. If you're facing a number of different charges on your overdraft or Unpaid fee in any one day, we’ll only charge you a single fee – whichever is the highest.

data.ProductDescription: Manage your global finances with a Barclays International Bank Account.
data.CardNotes: With the International Debit Card, you can pay for goods and services around the world, wherever the visa sign is displayed

Eligibility.Description: International Banking is available to you if you have £25,000 (or currency equivalent) to deposit and maintain across your accounts or hold a Mortgage.
Eligibility.EligibilityNotes: International Banking Service for account holders with £25,000 or more or currency equivalent) of cash or investments or a combination of the two with us

OverdraftTierBand.Notes: NOTE - Barclays overdrafts are charged daily fees (not interest rates) to make the cost of an overdraft easy to  understand. If you're facing a number of different charges on your overdraft or Unpaid fee in any one day, we’ll only charge you a single fee – whichever is the highest.

OverdraftTierBandSet.Notes: NOTE - Barclays overdrafts are charged daily fees (not interest rates) to make the cost of an overdraft easy to  understand. Emergency Borrowing lets you borrow an extra, pre-arranged amount if you need to go over your overdraft limit once in a while. It costs £5 a day, and you only pay if you use it. The £5 fee is capped at 7 days each monthly charging period, so it’ll never cost you more than £35 a month. If you've reached the 7-day cap and you have an overdraft, you'll then be charged the appropriate daily overdraft fee for the rest of that monthly charging period while you are in it. If you're facing a number of different charges on your overdraft or Unpaid fee in any one day, we’ll only charge you a single fee – whichever is the highest.

FeeSubDetails.FeesAndChargesNotes: £25 via online banking,  £40 via manual channels
£5 via online banking, £40 via letter, fax, standing order, face to face or telephone instruction
